document.full_text: top-ranked caroline wozniacki won her opening match at the sony ericsson open by beating bethanie mattek-sands 6-2, 7-5 on thursday.
document.title: wozniacki, sharapova win openers at key biscayne
lines_and_colors: top-ranked caroline wozniacki won her opening match at the sony ericsson open by beating bethanie mattek-sands 6-2, 7-5 on thursday.
